data.title: RATP Dev USA
data.meta_description: RATP Dev USA | 8,259 followers on LinkedIn. Your future. Our destination. | RATP Dev is a subsidiary of RATP Group established in 2002 to export the Group's operating and maintenance know how outside the historic transit network operated by RATP in the Paris region of France. RATP Dev now operates in 13 countries on four continents. In 2015, RATP Dev generated revenue exceeding 1.1B euros.
data.text:
🚸📚 School is back in session, and that means our little ones are hitting the books and the sidewalks once again! With heavier morning and afternoon traffic, it’s more important than ever to stay vigilant and watch out for kids on the road. Their safety is our shared responsibility! At RATP Dev USA, Safety is one of our core values. We're committed to creating safe environments for everyone and encourage you to do the same. Slow down, be alert, and let’s keep our community safe for the students making their way to and from school. Together, we can ensure a safe school year for all! 🚦👫 #BackToSchool #SafetyFirst #RTAPDevUSA

Destination Spotlight: Memphis, TN From the soulful rhythms of Beale Street to the rich history of Graceland, Memphis is a city that's alive with culture, music, and unforgettable experiences. Whether indulging in a world-famous BBQ, exploring the vibrant arts scene, or immersing yourself in the civil rights legacy at the National Civil Rights Museum, there's something here for everyone. Feel the rhythm of Memphis – where every visit is a journey into the heart of American music and history! 🎸🎶 In 2021, RATP Dev USA entered into a partnership to provide bus services with the Memphis Area Transit Authority. #MemphisTN #ExploreMemphis #Transit #RATPDevUSA #DestinationSpotlight

🎉🚍 Huge congratulations to Sun Tran, Sun Link, and Sun Van’s Marketing team who achieved a spectacular victory at the SWTA Conference in Texas, bringing home THREE prestigious Spotlight Awards! 🏆✨ This accolade recognizes their exceptional efforts and their significant positive impact on the community. Their team shined brightly, winning the Spotlight Awards for: 1. Event Promotion/Bus Roadeo 🚍 2. Social Media/Answering Common Questions with Gabby💬 3. Sun Tran's The Sun Newsletter 📰 We thank our incredible team for your hard work and dedication in making these initiatives shine. Your creativity and commitment are truly making a difference! 🙌🌟 #SunTran #SunLink #SunVan #SWTA #TransitExcellence #RATPDevUSA

🎉 Exciting News! 🎉 We're thrilled to welcome Winston-Salem's WSTA to the RATP Dev USA family! 🚍✨ Your dedication to providing exceptional public transportation is inspiring, and we can't wait to work together to elevate the transit experience for the Winston-Salem community. Here's to new beginnings and a future full of innovation and excellence! 🌟 #RATPDevUSA #TransitExcellence #WinstonSalem
